scripts.copy-static-files: mkdirp dist && cp index.html dist/ && cp -r static dist/ && npm run copy-wasm
scripts.dev: rimraf dist && npm run copy-static-files && node scripts/devserver.js
scripts.build: rimraf dist && npm run copy-static-files  && esbuild --bundle --target=es2020 --outfile=dist/_demo_bin.js --sourcemap src/index.ts
